page.shortlink: api client api a5 u math wrap method

argument.name: low
argument.description: The low end of the wrapping range.

argument.name: high
argument.description: The high end of the wrapping range.

page.description: Wrap a number so that it fits in the given range.

discussion.p: The A5.u.math.wrap method will wrap a number so that it is inside of the given range. This can be useful for when doing math on wrapping values such as an angle.
